title: Alternates - Early Access
description: This is the alpha version that lets the community experience fast-paced FPS action. Explore multiple modes and maps, test features, and give feedback. With web3 integration and NFT ownership players can own, customize, and trade assets, shaping the battlefield.
longDescription:

<!--title-->
# OVERVIEW ðŸ”«
<!--text-->
Alternates is a first-person shooter that blends classic FPS excitement with the possibilities of web3 technology. Built around fast-paced, skill-based gameplay, it integrates NFTs and blockchain elements in a way that still delivers the competitive, action-packed environment every FPS fan expects. Our mission? To create a community-driven world where anyone can jump in, have fun, and shape the gameâ€™s future - one update at a time.

<!--image-->
![Alternates-1q1rh](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/55a901b31a474a6489b89fed96b86ba7/alternates-1q1rh.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# EASY ONBOARDING & EARLY ACCESS ðŸš€
<!--text-->
In Alternates, all web3 integration happens behind the scenes, so you can dive right into the action without any extra hassle. Creating an account is as simple as entering your email - no complicated wallets or setups required. Since weâ€™re in early access, we rely on community feedback to fine-tune gameplay, introduce new features, and perfect the overall experience. With each update, weâ€™re making Alternates more accessible, fun, and ready for everyone to enjoy.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# NFT INTEGRATION ðŸ’Ž
<!--text-->
Unlike many projects that treat NFTs as mere collectibles, Alternates offers playable NFTs that truly enhance gameplay. Characters, weapon skins, and other assets can be owned, traded, or collected - adding depth and variety. Our first NFT drop on ApeChain sold out swiftly, showing strong demand and reinforcing our commitment to meaningful web3 integration. Expect more NFT initiatives designed with real in-game utility in mind.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# JOIN US IN BUILDING THE FUTURE ðŸ’¥
<!--text-->
Getting involved with Alternates now means more than just trying a new FPSâ€”itâ€™s about co-creating a next-generation web3 gaming experience. By merging accessible gameplay, evolving storytelling, strong community ties, and genuine NFT utility, we aim to redefine what a web3 FPS can be. Jump in, explore, and help shape the journey.
